General.text:
Type:
Benzodiazepines
Dosage Forms:
Common Trade Names: Valium

Adult_Dosing.text:
Anxiety
PO: 2 - 10 mg 2-4 times daily
Muscle spasm
PO: 2 - 10 mg 2-4 times daily
Sedation in ICU
IV: Loading dose: 5 - 10 mg, Maintenance dose: 0.03 - 0.1 mg/kg every 30 minutes to 6 hours

Special_Populations.text:
Pregnancy Rating
: D
Lactation: Diazepam and metabolites are present in breast milk
Renal Dosing
Adult
Not defined
Pediatric
Not defined
Hepatic Dosing
Adult
Not defined, use with caution, do not used oral tablets in severe hepatic impairment
Pediatric
Not defined, use with caution, do not used oral tablets in severe hepatic impairment

Contraindications.text:
Allergy to class/drug
severe hepatic impairment

Serious.text:
Respiratory/CNS depression
Hypotension
paradoxical CNS stimulation

Respiratory/CNS depression
Hypotension
paradoxical CNS stimulation

Pharmacology.text:
Half-life: 30-60 hours
Metabolism: Liver
Excretion: Urine
Mechanism of Action: GABA agonist

References.text: Diazepam: Drug information. UpToDate. www.uptodate.com. Accessed April 2, 2019.
